private.label: Premium 1-to-1
private.title: Private coaching
private.description: For students who want maximum customisation, tight accountability, and fast score improvements.
points: Deep dive into school tests, Math IA preparation, and mock exams.
Fully personalised by-topic drills and homework, adjusted weekly.
Weekly performance tracking with targeted correction of weak topics.
Ideal if you‚Äôre pushing for Level 7 / A* and want strict pacing.

intensive.label: 8-lesson intensive
points: Unlimited tailor-made past-paper practice with step-by-step solutions.
8 online lessons of 60 minutes with custom time allocation.
Detailed summary by topic and school mock exam prediction.
IBDP Math IA topic setup & guidance until completion.
Expected 2 grades improvement or better (e.g. from 5 to 7 in IBDP or from B to A* in A-Level) with full commitment.
Referral rebate of up to HKD 3,000 per student referred.

private.whatsappPrefillText: Hi Winson Siu, I am interested in booking a private coaching lesson. I am (name?) from (school?) in (year?).

group.label: High-value Structured Package
group.title: IBDP Math Level 7 Mastery System
group.description: Structured syllabus for IBDP, IGCSE and IBMYP students with full notes and exam-style practice.
points: Approx. 32+ high-quality live Zoom lessons with replays available.
Built for motivated students who want a full structure, consistent routines, and measurable progress.

iaSupport.eyebrow: With the help of PhD in Pure Mathematics Professionals
iaSupport.title: IBDP Math IA Guidance
iaSupport.description: A structured, topic-driven guidance format to help students produce a unique and high-quality Math IA.
lessonStructure: Customizes Math IA topics to align with individual student interests.
Integrates knowledge beyond the standard curriculum for enhanced grades.
Guides students to produce high-quality, unique essays efficiently within lesson time.
Achieved successful outcomes for over 80 students from 2020 to 2025.
Effectively boosts Predicted Grades and makes a positive impression on teachers.
Minimized the need for extra work outside of lessons.

topics.title: Ancient Math in Modern Times
topics.desc: Uncover how modern techniques breathe new life into solving ancient mathematical puzzles.

topics.title: Artistic Math
topics.desc: Unleash creativity through mathematical patterns and designs, blending art with equations.

topics.title: Astronomy and Mathematics
topics.desc: Delve into the celestial realm, using math to model the complex interactions of planets and stars.

topics.title: Environmental Math
topics.desc: Tackle environmental challenges and natural phenomena with insightful mathematical analysis.

topics.title: Geometry in Everyday Life
topics.desc: Investigate common objects through a mathematical lens, revealing hidden geometrical wonders.

topics.title: Math in Engineering
topics.desc: From designing roller coasters to solving structural problems, discover the application of math in engineering.

topics.title: Mathematics in Society
topics.desc: Explore socio-economic issues through mathematical methodologies, understanding the world in numbers.

topics.title: Practical Problem-Solving
topics.desc: Apply math to everyday scenarios, from game strategies to efficient division of resources.

topics.title: Sports and Mathematics
topics.desc: Explore the relationship between athletic performance and mathematical principles, like optimizing sports equipment.
